snippet: A new exhibition at Gagosian Gallery looks at Picasso’s years with Françoise Gilot, when his work reflected family and even domesticity.
abstract: Ken Johnson reviews Exhibition Picasso and Francoise Gilot: Paris-Vallauris, 1943-1953 at Gagosian Gallery.
lead_paragraph: A new exhibition at Gagosian Gallery looks at Picasso’s years with Françoise Gilot, when his work reflected family and even domesticity.

headline.main: A Portrait of the Artist as an Old Man in Love
headline.print_headline: A Portrait of the Artist As an Old Man in Love
